name: Corona Invaders (Pure Illusions)
description:
Corona Invaders is a Space Invaders type of game with the goal to eliminate corona viruses of all forms and colours.

Destroy all enemies to procede to the next level.

When you are defeated, you can make an entry into the online highscore (powered by globalstats.io).

But beware ... if you take too long viruses might mutate.

  • Online as well as offline highscore
  • Dark synthwave inspired aesthetics
  • Classic Shoot 'Em Up style
  • Biligual: English and German
  • (Almost) endless and frustrating game
  • Parallels to real life are just coincidental *cough* *cough*

Have fun.
